Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.5.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.5.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.5.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-44487
